item.title: Life as a Shill for Big Corporate
item.description: ğŸŒº Note from the Editor This article was originally published in November 2020. ğŸ’» A Bite of the Apple: Petticoat Socialism and the Biggest Tech Company in the World # Hobart Phillips # I use Apple products as the primary interfaces for consumer tech in most parts of my life. I use an iPhone paired to an Apple Watch and AirPods on the go, a MacBook Air at home, and an AppleTV in the living room.
